name: JSGameIDE
tagline: An open-source IDE+Library for Javascript Game Development
body:
### Welcome to JSGameIDE. JSGameIDE is both an IDE and a library, made to help you to create fabulous games in Javascript. Our objective is to provide you a reliable tool with a fast workflow and the possibility to create a high quality final product, for free. ### Documentation The documentation is currently in the development stage, so you'll need to wait a bit before you can use it. ### Want to help? If you did like the project and want to improve the general user experience with it, feel free to fork and develop. If the result turns out a good product, I'll add it to the main version (as an update) and put your name into the credits. ### Authors and Contributors This project is being developed by the following people: @patrickpissurno ### Support or Contact Having trouble with JSGameIDE? Check out the documentation at somewhere or contact me at patrickpissurno.nave@gmail.com and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out. ### License
JSGameIDE by Patrick Pissurno is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
